operations.name: Administrator
operations.title: Members with this permission have every permission and also bypass channel specific permissions. Granting this permission is dangerous

operations.name: View Audit Log (@todo: add audit logs)
operations.title: Members with this permission have access to view the servers audit logs

operations.name: Manage Organisation
operations.title: Members with this permission can change the organisation name and other organisation details

operations.name: Manage Roles
operations.title: Members with this permission can create/edit/delete roles inside this organisation

operations.name: Manage channels
operations.title: Members with this permission can create/edit/delete channels inside this organisation

operations.name: Manage webhooks (@todo: implement webhooks)
operations.title: Members with this permission can create, edit and delete webhooks

operations.name: Manage messages
operations.title: Members with this permission can edit/delete messages inside channels

operations.name: Manage reactions
operations.title: Members with this permission can add new reactions to a message
